text:
San Francisco, CA

Loggly is seeking Full Stack and Frontend Engineers to join our team. Loggly is the world’s most popular cloud-based enterprise-class log management solution. We’ve recently received $15M in new funding to accelerate our rapid growth, and have big plans for 2015.

Our app is built with Python and Angular. If you're interested in learning more, feel free to visit our site (https://www.loggly.com/about-loggly/) and please email me at vincent [at] loggly [dot] com. I'd love to treat you to coffee and answer any questions.
